memberdef.name: s_usageStr
memberdef.initializer:
= "Usage: %s [args]
" "-f/--foreground Run BWMachined in the foreground (i.e. not as a " "daemon)
" "-v/--version Display version information for BWMachined.
" "-p/--pid Set path for this process's PID file.
" " --port=PORT Set port for BWMachined to use.
" "-m/--cluster-mode=MODE Sets the cluster mode to use at startup. Valid " "options are 'ring', 'toplevel' and 'leaf'.
" "-t/--top-level-node=ADDR Target top level node to connect to as a leaf " "node (hostname or IP). Ignored in ring and toplevel modes.
" "-c/--config=PATH Configuration file for BWMachined to use.
"
